data.text: @mpihjapan Hi, I am very sorry for this inconvenience! If you aren't able to change your flight in Manage booking, please contact our customer service and they can help you: https://t.co/cDvIoqq3y6. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@hward91 Hi, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I'm not sure what your question is about, but perhaps the FAQ section can help as well: https://t.co/DpukIZClDz. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @blaberid @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment! If you aren't able to change your booking in our Manage booking: https://t.co/VwJtPZJM3S, please try contacting our customer service again. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@JMthagirl Hi, I am sincerely very sorry for this and the long waiting times currently! Please try contacting our customer service again, you can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @ady315 @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service! If you aren't able to change your booking in our Manage booking: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA, please try contacting our customer service again. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Rmincher @FinnairHelps Hi, unfortunately, the two ways to contact our customer service currently are through the chatbot and by calling. We are getting more calls than ever before, so the waiting times are long. I sincerely apologise for this! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @kariennn_ Hi Karien, coronavirus test is not required for domestic flights. I hope you will have a lovely time in Finland! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@haniatius Hei, olen todella pahoillani tästä! Meiltä pitäisi tulla peruutusviestin lisäksi tieto uusista lennoista, mutta jostain syystä tätä viestiä ei ole teille tullut. Toivottavasti saitte asiakaspalvelumme kiinni ja vanhempasi pääsivät matkaan. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @aoctavio3 Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service! Please try to contact them again to see if there is anything they can do for you. You can also fill in the feedback form on our website: https://t.co/QnwlxpQKFS. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Kingkaustubh Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service currently! Due to tightened regulations set by the Singapore authorities for VTL-flights, ticket sale to Singapore is suspended 22 December 2021-20 January 2022: https://t.co/SF8jKquL4Z. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: @RodneyCintron Hi, we require proof of vaccination only when your final destination requires it. For the USA, this depends e.g. on your nationality. Please check the current requirements here: https://t.co/l1PgCdXHY3. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
If you are required to take a coronavirus test before your trip, we recommend you take it as close to the departure as possible.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We have been forced to cancel some flights, as the omicron variant and the flu season are causing increased sickness absences in Finnair and our partners' teams. If your flight were to be disrupted, we will contact you via SMS and/or e-mail. Read more at https://t.co/50Gh15CziM. https://t.co/9VDgHflAd8

@MerjaRukko @FinnairSuomi Hei, olen erittäin pahoillani, että olemme joutuneet perumaan lentoja lyhyelläkin varoitusajalla mm. lisääntyneiden omikron-variantista johtuvien sairaspoissaolojen takia. Toivottavasti uusi lento ja uusi kyyti Kuusamoon järjestyi äidillesi. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@MaaritMkinen5 @FinnairSuomi Suosittelemme ottamaan koronatestin mahdollisimman lähellä lentosi lähtöä. Jos testi kuitenkin vanhenee lennon peruuntumisen/viivästymisen vuoksi, voit muuttaa matkustuspäiviäsi ilman muutoskulua asiakaspalvelumme kautta, vaikka lentosi lähtöön olisi alle 48 tuntia. -Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Refund form
urls.description: With this form, you can request special assistance for your flight if you have a handicap or illness, or inform us about the details of your medical device.

data.text: @MartinMBrown Hi, I apologise for this! You can apply for a refund here: https://t.co/hxX56GTfbR. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@noregrof Hi, I am very sorry for this inconvenience! I'm not sure which flight is in question, but due to the omicron variant and tightened travel restriction, we might not have another flight to offer you at this point, unfortunately. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @Umbyboy Hi, if you aren't able to make the change in Manage booking: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA, please try contacting our customer service once more: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I am very sorry for the long waiting times at the moment! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@MinaKedis Hi Mina, Finland doesn't require the pre-test from transfer passengers continuing to an international flight. Have a nice flight! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@aphujanen @FinnairHelps @TopiManner Hi, I am very sorry for the technical problem in our Manage booking that prevents the flight change in some cases. If you aren't able to make the change yourself there, please contact our customer service https://t.co/oC3lkjl5HX and they can assist you. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@aphujanen @FinnairHelps @TopiManner Because of increasing sickness absences and challenging weather, we have been forced to cancel some flights. However, of course, the information regarding this should have reached you, and I apologise once more if it hasn't. -Ada/Finnair

@aphujanen @FinnairHelps @TopiManner Hi, I am extremely sorry about this! We send a message about the cancellation and another one about the rerouting, but for some reason, these messages have not unfortunately reached you. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: We have updated the prices of Finnair coronavirus tests. Finnair rapid antigen test is now €65 for Finnair passengers and €79 for other customers, and Finnair PCR test is now €93 for Finnair’s passengers and €120 for other customers. https://t.co/LzGZBYEgSs

In December, Finnair carried 602,700 passengers, which was 551.4% more than in December 2020. The number of passengers in December 2021 was 23.8% more than in November 2021. https://t.co/EvO9keDOTI https://t.co/H2isEByBlc

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: @NoeliaGlez1 Yes, both PCR and antigen tests are accepted when travelling to Finland: https://t.co/diJSSEzRB8. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Are you returning home from the holidays? We recommend you do the check-in in advance and arrive at the airport early to get a smooth start to your journey back home. See also our other tips: https://t.co/T4Ou9Xeze9 https://t.co/NANkkcSMtY

@VanessaJetwash Hi, unfortunately, our customer service is very occupied at the moment and the waiting times are long. The two ways to contact us right now are the chatbot or by calling us: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@coderbyheart @FinnairHelps Hi, yes - we are getting more calls than ever before into our customer service. The waiting times are unfortunately very long at the moment. Thank you for your patience and apologies about this! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@james_price101 @FinnairHelps Hi, I am not sure why there haven't been any announcements and additional information available for you. And I am very sorry for this as well as the delay. Hopefully, you got to your final destination safely despite this inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Unbroken1888 Hi, you can find all our phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. We do have a Thailand contact number as well, Phone: +66 2 430 4791 (English, Thai). I apologise for the long waiting times! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@spekulatius1984 Hi, if you aren't able to make the change in Manage booking, please try again contacting our customer service and they will be able to help you. I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting times at the moment. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

2021 was another year spent in a global pandemic but there were some bright spots of celebrations.

data.text: @MsAlliance @emirates Hi, there are actually many ways to use your Finnair Plus points, at least the Finnair Plus award points. You can read more here: https://t.co/yL5XqGcU6X. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Order quality products to your seat or home | Finnair Shop
urls.description: Finnair Shop offers a wide selection of goods ranging from travel essentials, cosmetics and homeware to products from popular Finnish brands. Use Finnair Plus points, money or a combination of both for your purchase.

data.text: Finnair Shop works normally again: https://t.co/kihOsBoYnu

@GinaWijgerse @FinnairHelps Hi, there is more information on the air bubble here: https://t.co/ovIn824R9E. We currently fly from Delhi to Amsterdam via Helsinki 4 times a week. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Erikoismatkatavarat
urls.description: Katso muistilistamme erikoismatkatavaran, kuten soittimen kuljettamiseen. Lue lisää rajoituksista erikoismatkatavaroiden kuljettamiseen Finnairin lennolla.

data.text: @hyper9999 Hei, suksipussi ja erillinen monokassi kirjataan kahdeksi erilliseksi matkatavaraksi, kun ne on pakattu erikseen. Hiihtovarusteista on lisätietoa täällä: https://t.co/bBNHHhHCfY. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair
@anttipajunen Hi, I am very sorry for the inconvenience! We are fixing the issue and hope to have Finnair Shop working soon again. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@SariogluTulay Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service channels. We are currently getting more contacts than ever before. Please try again. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@NichollsPhilip Hi, please check your specific case with our customer service. If you have a booking for our Krabi flights, you should get instructions on your options via email. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@LeFuzzyOtter Hi, we accept PCR- and antigen tests and you will need a certificate of your negative test result. https://t.co/OcJvuigDVT. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Finnair Shop is currently not working properly due to an unexpected technical issue. We are fixing it and hope to have it working soon. Please visit it again later. We apologise for any inconvenience. https://t.co/vnOaItGknm

data.text: Check your destination’s travel requirements easily in the travel restrictions map on our website: https://t.co/XzcJck2y1i. The same map is used by our customer service. We currently get exceptionally many calls and are unable to answer questions regarding travel restrictions. https://t.co/2rcdQRuu8K
@AngelsGI66 Despite feeling hungry on the flights and not being completely happy with us, I hope you will still have a lovely time here in Finland! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Comentarios y compensaciones
urls.description: Agradecemos sus comentarios y estamos a su disposición para ayudarle con sus reclamaciones y otros asuntos. Su opinión es de gran valor para nosotros, ya que nos ayuda a mejorar nuestros servicios. Para obtener más información general, consulte nuestro apartado de preguntas frecuentes u obtenga ayuda de nuestro servicio de chat en cualquier momento. Finnair informa a los pasajeros de la posibilidad de iniciar un procedimiento de resolución alternativa de litigios de los usuarios de transporte aéreo ante

data.text: @AngelsGI66 Hi, if you have paid for seats that you didn't receive, you can make a complaint and try to apply for a refund here: https://t.co/sxSHmdOlWN. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@AngelsGI66 Hi, I am sorry you were left feeling hungry. Perhaps you could pre-order a sandwich for your return flight to prevent that from happening again: https://t.co/vDwLtQzEO5. Our onboard Nordic Kitchen selection is limited. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@candebc Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service. Please try contacting them again. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@SweetCleveleys Hi, if it doesn't work for your flights, please contact our customer service and they should be able to help you. I don't have access to any of the bookings, unfortunately. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@V1r7anen @FinnairHelps Hi, I'm glad to hear we were able to help. Happy travels when the time comes! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Rmincher @FinnairHelps Hi, I am very sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service! I hope you were able to reach them and arrange an alternative flight. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@ChuyHernan81 Hi, could this page be any help for you: https://t.co/ag7kEHYacH? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Kylo_Ren20 Hi, we do not have a contact email, unfortunately. You can reach our customer service via chat or phone call. What kind of issue are you having, could there be an answer in our FAQs: https://t.co/DpukIZClDz. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @tomatkids @FinnairHelps Hi, we do not have status information for our flights on our website. You would find that out at the destination airport websites, for instance. I hope you got your daughter there safe! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@BTSwillendSoon Hi, I don't, unfortunately, have any more information than what our customer service does so unfortunately I'm unable to help you with this. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@alexnoyer Hi, I am extremely sorry about this! Have you created a report about the delayed baggage, here are some instructions: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Who do I contact if I have lost property at an airport or on board a Finnair flight?
urls.description: The item will be handed over to Suomen Löytötavarapalvelu (Lo st and Found service). Please visit their website for contact information. Please note that if the lost item is a passport, it will be given to Finnish Border Control. Tobacco products, alcohol, and other duty-free items left on the aircraft are given to Helsinki Airport Customs Passenger Control. Please contact them via phone at +358 9 6141. Please contact the local airport’s lost and found office. Depending on the item and who finds it

data.text: @JordanJouffroy Hi, I believe you can either call the Lost and found service at +358 600 41 006 or make an online enquiry. Here's more information: https://t.co/Qrn7aBwpg5. I hope you will be able to find it! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: Dreaming of a skiing holiday in Central Europe? Find out what is a great destination when travelling with kids, and where you can find Europe’s steepest slopes with breathtaking views. Check out our tips for Germany, Austria and Switzerland: https://t.co/v5nEs926Gn

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: @attila_mocanu @sunsetchaser_ Hi, apologies for the late reply. The test is not required if you are transferring to an international flight. You can check the requirements for your final destination here: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@_fersecco Hi, home testing is not valid but both PCR and antigen tests are accepted. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@MartijnVermist Hi, I am extremely sorry for this inconvenience! I hope you have received your luggage by now, but in case you haven't, here are some instructions: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @cecile433 Hi, I am not sure which country or date is in question, but you can change your travel dates according to our flexible booking policy: https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl. If you aren't able to do the change in Manage booking, please contact our customer service. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@BastianHartig @FinnairHelps Hi, I am sincerely very sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service currently. Kindly try again. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Pets on Finnair flights
urls.description: Information about transporting pets on Finnair flights.

data.text: @misery_williams Hi, after you have a booking for yourself, please make a reservation for your pet within 24 hours in our chat service. You can find more information here: https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@ludileiva Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! Please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. They will be able to help you with your bookings. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @sunsetchaser_ Hi, yes - we have extended our flexible booking until 28 February and it's valid for the existing bookings. You can read more here: https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@kimdelagarde Hi, I apologise for the long waiting times in our customer service currently. Please try again our chatbot or calling our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@AmySneddon17 Hi, unfortunately, I don't have access to bookings. Please try again calling our customer service. I apologise for the long waiting times currently and thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@JohanRMoller Hi, please try again calling our customer service if you aren't able to change your travel dates in Manage booking. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@ovaries420 @FinnairHelps Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service currently. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

We apologise for the delays in baggage handling at Helsinki Airport, and we are working hard together with our ground handling partner to improve the situation. If your baggage didn’t arrive with you, please make a report and we'll deliver it to you: https://t.co/9ywnszjfyA. https://t.co/69Xz25pjYt

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: The pre-test is not required for Finnish citizens or residents, travellers arriving in the country for an essential reason or travellers connecting to an international flight in Helsinki. More information will be updated here: https://t.co/10LbEoil5S

Entry requirements to Finland change when arriving from the EU or Schengen area between 28 December and 16 January. Please present a negative coronavirus test result taken earliest 48 h before arrival in addition to a vaccination or recovery certificate. https://t.co/DIw86tn3kk

@BarsdellAdam Hi, that specific flight seems to be overbooked and thus not available for booking currently. You can keep an eye on it in case the aircraft changes to a bigger one or the booking situation changes otherwise. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
However, if you have already received your Thailand Pass QR code, you can enter Thailand under the scheme.

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: Thailand is changing its travel requirements as of 22 December. Applying for new Thailand Passes, except under the Phuket sandbox model, is no longer possible. The second RT-PCR test is required within 6-7 days after arrival. See what’s required at https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x https://t.co/PuL5p0q4ek

You can now order Nordic Kitchen onboard menu products via our inflight entertainment system and pay them securely using your own mobile device. This service awarded with the international Red Dot design award is available for you on most of our intercontinental flights. https://t.co/pg0KzjWdSG

entity.description: New York City

data.text: @georgeharter You could try to book NYC-HEL-NYC separately and HEL-NAP-HEL separately or contact our customer service to make you the NYC-NAP-NYC booking, but you would have to stay overnight in Helsinki. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

entity.name: New York City

data.text: @georgeharter Hi, in September we have flights between HEL and NAP on Thursdays and Mondays. However, there isn't unfortunately any possible connection from NAP to NYC, as the NAP flight is arriving in HEL later than the connections to NYC leave.
